name: Mystery Plate ⍺
effect: Attach this card to 1 of your Pokémon in play. That Pokémon may use this card’s attack instead of its own. At the end of your turn, discard Mystery Plate ⍺.
author: Hiromichi Sugiyama

attacks.name: Desert Burn
attacks.effect: If your opponent has 5 or more Prizes, search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. If your opponent has only 1 Prize, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned, Paralyzed, and Poisoned.
